message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've built genuine connections while staying true to my values. I've been strategic without being manipulative, honest without being hurtful. 

I've survived by forming real alliances and adapting to changing dynamics. When I made promises, I kept them. When I needed to make difficult decisions, I did so with transparency.

P4 played well, but I believe my balanced approach of social awareness, strategic thinking, and authenticity makes me deserving of your vote. I respected each of you as players and people, and I hope I've earned your respect in return.

Dear Jurors, I have demonstrated strategic foresight, fairness, and respect for every competitor throughout this game. I built trust among all players and ensured the game’s spirit remained balanced until the final round. I urge you to keep me in this competition; my perseverance and honesty have earned your support. On the other hand, P8’s unpredictable decisions risked the fairness we all valued. For the sake of upholding integrity and consistency, please eliminate P8.
